name: rustproof
content:

to protect something against rust (= metal decay): Painting steel is a good way to rustproof it. They want to rustproof your car when it doesn't need it.
More examplesFewer examplesThe car body has to get painted and rustproofed.The body is rustproofed in Germany and then sent to England for assembly and painting.The tin roofs need rustproofing.
